kw.name: Connect To Database
kw.doc: Loads the DB API 2.0 module given `dbapiModuleName` then uses it to connect to the database using `dbName`, `dbUsername`, and `dbPassword`.
kw.msg: Connecting using : psycopg2.connect(database=dubneckp, user=dubneckp, password=ee8Q5gfemekDwIRgt5DdgU01wK8hoYqp, host=babar.db.elephantsql.com, port=5432)

kw.name: Get Hashed Pass
kw.msg: ${hashed_pass} = $2b$08$TE2NywYWMrzmlT9CRP.tqOmXUyf5AAZ5RE7RSDB5GgLdvVYB9UCya

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.arg: INSERT INTO public.users (name, email, password_hash, is_geek) values ('${u}[name] ${u}[lastname]', '${u}[email]', '${hashed_pass}', false)
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
kw.msg: ${q} = INSERT INTO public.users (name, email, password_hash, is_geek) values ('James Stevens', 'clarkpatrick@yahoo.com', '$2b$08$TE2NywYWMrzmlT9CRP.tqOmXUyf5AAZ5RE7RSDB5GgLdvVYB9UCya', false)

kw.name: Execute Sql String
kw.doc: Executes the sqlString as SQL commands. Useful to pass arguments to your sql. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.
kw.msg: Executing : Execute SQL String | INSERT INTO public.users (name, email, password_hash, is_geek) values ('James Stevens', 'clarkpatrick@yahoo.com', '$2b$08$TE2NywYWMrzmlT9CRP.tqOmXUyf5AAZ5RE7RSDB5GgLdvVYB9UCya', false)

kw.name: Disconnect From Database
kw.doc: Disconnects from the database.
kw.msg: Executing : Disconnect From Database

kw.msg: Fills the text 'User' in the given field.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'test@email.com' in the given field.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'ab3c' in the given field.

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Alert Span Should Be
kw.arg: Informe uma senha com pelo menos 6 caracteres

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector css=span[class=error] >> text=Informe uma senha com pelo menos 6 caracteres at state visible

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: ${user} = {'name': 'Test', 'lastname': 'User', 'email': 'test@email.com', 'password': 'a23bc'}

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates to the given ``url``.
kw.msg: Successfully opened URL https://geeks-web-andre.fly.dev/signup

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector css=.signup-form h1 >> text="Cadastro" at state visible
